method.name: setDir
method.description:
Sets the project directory for the build.
param:dir The project directory. Should not be null.

method.name: setStartParameter
method.description:
Sets the full set of parameters that will be used to execute the build.
param:startParameter the parameters. Should not be null.

method.name: getTasks
method.description:
Returns the tasks that should be executed for this build.

returns:The sequence. May be empty. Never returns null.

method.name: setTasks
method.description:
Sets the tasks that should be executed for this build.
param:tasks The task names. May be empty or null to use the default tasks for the build.

method.name: getStartParameter
method.description:
Returns the full set of parameters that will be used to execute the build.

returns:the parameters. Never returns null.

method.name: getDir
method.description:
Returns the project directory for the build. Defaults to the project directory.

returns:The project directory. Never returns null.

method.name: getBuildFile
method.description:
Returns the build file that should be used for this build. Defaults to {@value org.gradle.api.Project#DEFAULT_BUILD_FILE} in the project directory.

returns:The build file. May be null.

method.name: setBuildFile
method.description:
Sets the build file that should be used for this build.
param:file The build file. May be null to use the default build file for the build.

property.name: tasks
property.description:
Returns the tasks that should be executed for this build.

returns:The sequence. May be empty. Never returns null.

property.name: startParameter
property.description:
Returns the full set of parameters that will be used to execute the build.

returns:the parameters. Never returns null.

property.name: buildFile
property.description:
Returns the build file that should be used for this build. Defaults to {@value org.gradle.api.Project#DEFAULT_BUILD_FILE} in the project directory.

returns:The build file. May be null.

property.name: dir
property.description:
Returns the project directory for the build. Defaults to the project directory.

returns:The project directory. Never returns null.
